subject: Horses
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Jardin took control with a furlong left and ran to a four-length victory in the $112,900 Schuylerville Stakes for 2-year-old fillies at rain-swept Saratoga Race Course. Ocean Colors, a 2-year-old filly out of Winning Colors, finished last among the nine horses on the sloppy track.
